ProductInfo.Features:
Wireless security through WiFi! No running wires, yet the video signal is as secure as your WiFi network.
Connect up to 9 cameras. Your WiFi router recognizes all 9 cameras as one connection. Cameras can be up to 300ft from your router.
Easy to access and setup. View video from any camera from any modern computer or mobile device.
Record video, review footage, from a computer on your network.
Up to 8 users can access the cameras simultaneously.
ProductInfo.Name: Smoke Detector - Hidden Wifi Spy Camera Nanny Cam Hidden Camera with Online Viewing Surveillance Over Network Home Security Camera
